buyItem(address,uint256).details: Payable for the buyer to buy the NFT from the marketplace with ETH or other Layer-1 currency

params.nftAddress: The address of the NFT contract
params.tokenId: Index of the NFT in the NFT contract

params.nftAddress: The address of the NFT contract
params.tokenId: Index of the NFT in the NFT contract

listItem(address,uint256,uint256).details: Owners hold one or more NFTs and give approval for the marketplace to sell it for themApprovals use "getApproved" function from EIP-721Modifier "notYetListed" make sure the token is not already listed on the marketplaceModifier "isOwner" make sure the token owner is indeed the seller

params.nftAddress: The address of the NFT contract
params.price: The initial price for the NFT
params.tokenId: Index of the NFT in the NFT contract

updateListing(address,uint256,uint256).details: As when the listing was created, the new price must be greater than zero

params.newPrice: The new price for the NFT listing
params.nftAddress: The address of the NFT contract
params.tokenId: Index of the NFT in the NFT contract

withdrawProceeds().details: Prevent reantrancy attacks #1 by locking the functionPrevent reantrancy attacks #2 by setting the balance to 0 before the actual transfer

buyItem(address,uint256).notice: Allow someone to buy an NFT from the marketplace

cancelListing(address,uint256).notice: Allow the owner to remove a listed NFT item from the marketplace

listItem(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Add existing NFTs on the marketplace listing

updateListing(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Allow the owner to update the price of a listed NFT item in the marketplace

withdrawProceeds().notice: Withdraw all money from NFT selling on the marketplace

userdoc.notice: Contract for NFT management on the marketplace
